From this analysis, we see that in Row 2, the game against the New England Patriots was at the RCA Dome. However, in Row 14, the game against the same opponent was held at Foxboro Stadium.

Since there is an instance (Row 14) where the game site is not the RCA Dome, the claim is false.

  - Column "opponent": new england patriots
